title: Music Stand (Pupitre)
description: Music Stand (Pupitre); Attributed to Martin Carlin (French, born Germany, about 1730 - 1785, master 1766); Paris, France; about 1770 - 1775; Oak veneered with tulipwood, amaranth (or purple heart), holly and fruitwood, and incised with colored mastics; gilt bronze mounts; 148.6 × 50.2 × 36.5 cm (58 1/2 × 19 3/4 × 14 3/8 in.); 55.DA.4; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
